name: Cryptstalker Headpiece
tooltip:
Cryptstalker HeadpieceLevel 60

Huntsman Leopold at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make a Cryptstalker Headpiece if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Headpiece, 15 Wartorn Chain Scraps, 4 Arcanite Bars and 2 Nexus Crystals.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Headpiece
- Wartorn Chain Scrap x 15
- Arcanite Bar x 4
- Nexus Crystal x 2
